subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: José Acasuso retired with a left knee injury to give Andy Roddick, who turned 25 on Thursday, a 4-6, 6-1, 6-2 second-round victory.
snippet: José Acasuso retired with a left knee injury to give Andy Roddick, who turned 25 on Thursday, a 4-6, 6-1, 6-2 second-round victory.
